user_query: I'm starting a new company and need to analyze the performance of different currency pairs. Can you fetch the OHLC history for the EUR-USD, GBP-EUR, and JPY-USD pairs? Furthermore, it would be helpful to know all the available forex pairs for future analysis.

TaskList.description: Fetch the list of all available forex pairs for analysis.
Fetch the OHLC (Open, High, Low, Close) history for the EUR-USD currency pair.
Fetch the OHLC (Open, High, Low, Close) history for the GBP-EUR currency pair.
Fetch the OHLC (Open, High, Low, Close) history for the JPY-USD currency pair.
